评论概述: Wallet is slim, but cards don't lay flat
类型: Color: Deep Brown
评论详情: When the wallet arrived I was as excited as you could get about a new wallet. The leather felt and looked nice. It was slim, and I was very excited to see card slots on both sides as I don't need to show my ID enough to warrant a dedicated license pocket with a window. Once I started putting the cards in the backside a serious design flaw, in my eyes, was discovered. The cards stick out of the slots at a decent angle, which in the short term will catch on the pocket seam every time it is inserted/removed from your pocket and in the long term will make the cards crack where they lay across the card pocket seam. I gave it two stars for the price and the materials.
